Package Model.Players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Model.Players.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
AIPlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
Class used to model a generic Uno player,
provides methods to make basic plays during the game.
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele
